title: KISSAIR Compact 1500W/750W Space Heater with Thermostat - ETL Certified Ceramic Portable Heater Fan, Ideal for Home/Dorm/Office/Kitchen, Black; indoor, electric, size: 7.72" x 6.38" x 9.13"; weight: 2.6 pounds, three modes: heating 750W, heating 1500W, air circulation; safety: automatically turns off at 45 degrees; delivers heating in 2 seconds, PTC (Positive Temperature Coefficient), noise below 45 dB
descriptions:
Introducing the KISSAIR Compact Space Heater with Thermostat! This indoor heater is perfect for keeping your home, dorm, office, or kitchen warm and cozy. With its sleek black design, it will seamlessly blend into any space.

The KISSAIR Compact Space Heater offers two power options to suit your needs. The low heat setting provides 750W of power, while the high heat setting offers 1500W of warmth. Additionally, you can use the fan mode for air circulation.

Safety is a top priority with this heater. It features overheat protection to ensure that it automatically shuts off if it gets too hot. The tip-over protection also provides peace of mind, with a shutoff angle of 45 degrees.

Measuring at just 7.72 inches in width, 6.38 inches in depth, and 9.13 inches in height, this heater is compact and easy to place in any room. It weighs only 2.6 pounds, making it portable and convenient to move around.

The KISSAIR Compact Space Heater is ETL certified, guaranteeing its quality and safety. It is powered by electricity and utilizes a PTC heating element for efficient and quick heating. In fact, it can heat up a room in just 2 seconds!

Don't worry about disturbing noise levels, as this heater operates below 45 dB, ensuring a quiet and peaceful environment.

Stay warm and comfortable with the KISSAIR Compact Space Heater with Thermostat. Order yours today and experience the cozy warmth it provides!

Introducing the KISSAIR Compact Space Heater with Thermostat! This indoor electric heater is perfect for keeping your home, dorm, office, or kitchen warm and cozy. With its sleek black design, it will blend seamlessly with any decor.

This compact space heater offers two power options for customized heating. You can choose between low heat (750W) or high heat (1500W) depending on your comfort level. It also features a fan mode for air circulation, ensuring that the heat is evenly distributed throughout the room.

Safety is a top priority with this space heater. It is equipped with overheat protection, which automatically shuts off the heater if it gets too hot. The tip-over protection feature ensures that the heater turns off when it is tilted at a 45-degree angle, preventing any accidents.

Measuring at just 7.72 inches in width, 6.38 inches in depth, and 9.13 inches in height, this space heater is compact and easy to move around. It weighs only 2.6 pounds, making it lightweight and portable.

The KISSAIR Compact Space Heater is certified by ETL, guaranteeing its safety and quality. It uses a PTC (Positive Temperature Coefficient) heating element, which provides quick heating in just 2 seconds. Plus, it operates at a noise level below 45 dB, ensuring a quiet and comfortable environment.

Don't miss out on the KISSAIR Compact Space Heater with Thermostat! Stay warm and cozy all winter long with this reliable and efficient indoor heater.
